Module: BTMProfileModule

Members

(static) ACTION_BTM_BATTERY

The action value of event indicating the battery of BTM device.
The key and value will be as below:
KeyValue
actionBTMProfileModule.ACTION_BTM_BATTERY("battery_btm")
BTMProfileModule.BTM_BATTERY("battery")Battery percentage.
0 Low powe ,1 Not Low power
message example:
{
    "battery": 0
}
Source:
  • BTMProfileModule.js, line 31

KeyValue
actionBTMProfileModule.ACTION_BTM_MEMORY("memory_btm")

alue range: 0-255

KeyValue

Invalid state.

(static) BTM_BATTERY

The key of the power of battery for BTM device.
Returns the message Key corresponding relation:
  • BTM_BATTERY ----> "battery".
Value range:
0 Low power 1 Not Low power
